generic.input:
newline ,
- Longitude Degree float /ai/models/carrier[0]/position/longitude-deg %f
- Latitude Degree float /ai/models/carrier[0]/position/latitude-deg %f
- altitude float /ai/models/carrier[0]/position/altitude-ft %f
- Yaw float /ai/models/carrier[0]/orientation/heading-deg %f
- Pitch float /ai/models/carrier[0]/orientation/pitch-deg %f
- Roll float /ai/models/carrier[0]/orientation/roll-deg %f
